column1: Specifications: "Indoor/outdoor 4K PoE camera with 3x optical zoom
Far-field microphone array for two-way audio
"Dimensions": "Without mount: Ø86 x 112.6 mm (Ø3.4 x 4.4\")\nWith mount: Ø86 x 175.3 mm (Ø3.4 x 6.9\")"
"Weight": "Without mount: 675 g (1.5 lb)\nWith mount: 820 g (1.8 lb)"
"Night mode": "Built-in IR LED illumination and an IR cut filter"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-20 to 50° C (-4 to 122° F)"
